text: I order from Rueby's cuisine every week. Their Egusi soup tastes exactly like my mom's cooking! The portion suits my expectation and the protein is always fresh. As a working professional with no time to cook, this has been a lifesaver.
name: Kumali

text: I've tried many food delivery services, but Rueby's Cuisine stands out. Always on time, food arrives hot, and the quality is consistently excellent. I've been a customer for a very long time and there is no reason to stop patronizing. I will recommend Rueby's cuisine everytime
name: David

text: It's been over 9 years that I've known Rueby Cuisine and I've not had a single bad tale to share. You have gifted hands that blesses taste buds whenever you create a meal. Thank you for the quality you put into your work. Can't wait to patronize you again RuebyðŸ’¯
name: James
